summary: This document is an outbound wire request from Richard Kahn for a transfer of 11,150,000 Euros. It includes details about the wire transfer process, account information, and verification requirements for the transaction.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is requesting a wire transfer of 11,150,000 Euros and is involved in the process of converting dollars to euros.

events.title: Outbound Wire Request
events.description: Richard Kahn requests a wire transfer of 11,150,000 Euros.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn is requesting a wire transfer of 11,150,000 Euros.
The wire transfer request includes specific instructions for currency conversion.
The document outlines the verification process required for the wire transfer.
There are multiple mentions of account and customer IDs related to the wire transfer.
The document emphasizes the importance of accuracy in the wire transfer instructions.
